author: Ricccardo Aletta
description: Mezcal lends a lightly smoky note to this riff on the classic Tuxedo. This boozy Martini-esque cocktail makes for a great aperitif.
name: Tuxedo Affumicato
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)
